item.name: Romantic trip
item.description: Paris is one of the most beautiful, amazing and romantic cities in Europe, amazing with its history, architecture, museums and attractions, including the world-famous Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame de Paris Cathedral, etc.

item.name: Paradise
item.description: Seeing the Maldives means visiting one of the most beautiful corners of the world. Nature has created more than a hundred atolls here in the middle of the ocean, and man has complemented the magnificent natural landscapes of the islands with a variety of hotels.

item.name: Metropolis
item.description: New York City is a metropolis that has long been a center of culture, commerce, and innovation. Located in the northeastern United States, it is the largest city in the country and home to more than 8 million people.
